short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up reviews on Find Me GF from any restaurant's website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you go to a restaurant's website, click the FMGF extension. If we find a listing match, we will show the rating summary and review for it right in your browser. You can then click on the listing to view the listing details on the FMGF website.
